entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the one who set the potion task for Harry, Ron, and Hermione. The text states that Snape could hardly have set them a more difficult potion, implying that Professor Umbridge was involved in setting the task.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who is supervising Harry, Ron, and Hermione while they work on their potions. He gives them instructions and checks on their progress.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students working on the potion task. The text describes his cauldron as issuing copious amounts of dark gray steam.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is another student working on the potion task. His cauldron is described as spitting green sparks.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the students working on the potion task.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student who is also working on the potion task. The text describes him as feverishly prodding his cauldron.
